document_data.name: Rondeval
document_data.Background: The town was named after [[Rondeval]], a legendary stage performer. The trade-moot was a place of constant gossip and intrigue, where people looking to get rich quick gathered to try to get a variety of jobs. Rondeval was also know for its skilled artists specialized in making fake treasure maps.
document_data.Government: The owner of the inn acted as the ruler of the town, although technically the town has no official ruler.
document_data.History: The town grown around the original inn founded by Rondeval.
document_data.Notable inhabitants: * Rondeval, a legendary stage performer and founder of the town.
